effects: Darkness: you can expend 1 Focus Point to cast Darkness without components; you can see within its area when you cast it with this feature.
While the spell persists, you can move its area to a space within 60 feet at the start of each of your turns.
Darkvision: you gain darkvision to 60 feet (or extend existing darkvision by 60 feet).
Shadowy Figments: you know Minor Illusion; Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

feature_defs.trigger: while entirely within dim light or darkness
effects: You can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness.
You have advantage on the next melee attack you make before the end of the current turn.
You can expend 1 Focus Point to ignore the requirement that you start and end in dim light or darkness for that use.
As part of the same bonus action, you can make one unarmed strike immediately after you teleport.

feature_defs.trigger: as a magic action while entirely within dim light or darkness
effects: You expend 3 Focus Points to shroud yourself with shadows for 1 minute (ends if you are Incapacitated or if you end your turn in bright light).
Invisibility: you have the Invisible condition.
Partially Incorporeal: you can move through occupied spaces as if difficult terrain; if you end your turn in such a space, you are shunted to the last unoccupied space.
Shadow Flurry: you can use Flurry of Blows without expending Focus Points.
